TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientSideProviderDescription extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 描述客户端 UI 自动化提供程序的范围，以便在 UI 自动化客户端应用程序上注册。

span.span: Describes the scope of a client-side UI Automation provider so that it can be registered with the UI Automation client application.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback clientSideProviderFactoryCallback, string className) cil managed
Public Sub New (clientSideProviderFactoryCallback As ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback, className As String)

param.name: clientSideProviderFactoryCallback
param.span: 为窗口创建客户端提供程序的方法。

span.span: The method that creates the client-side provider for a window.

param.name: className
param.span: 提供程序所用于的窗口的类名称。

span.span: The class name of the windows that the provider is used for.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 UI 自动化遇到类的窗口时 `className` ，它将调用 `clientSideProviderFactoryCallback` 来创建客户端提供程序的实例。When UI Automation encounters a window of class `className`, it calls `clientSideProviderFactoryCallback` to create an instance of the client-side provider. 如果 `className` 为 `null` ，则将提供程序用于找不到任何其他提供程序的所有窗口。If `className` is `null`, the provider is used for all windows for which no other provider is found. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 [创建客户端 UI 自动化提供程序](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/create-a-client-side-ui-automation-provider)。For example code, see [Create a Client-Side UI Automation Provider](/dotnet/framework/ui-automation/create-a-client-side-ui-automation-provider).

MemberSignature.Value: public ClientSideProviderDescription (System.Windows.Automation.ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback clientSideProviderFactoryCallback, string className, string imageName, System.Windows.Automation.ClientSideProviderMatchIndicator flags);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Automation.ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback clientSideProviderFactoryCallback, string className, string imageName, valuetype System.Windows.Automation.ClientSideProviderMatchIndicator flags) cil managed
Public Sub New (clientSideProviderFactoryCallback As ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback, className As String, imageName As String, flags As ClientSideProviderMatchIndicator)

public: ClientSideProviderDescription(System::Windows::Automation::ClientSideProviderFactoryCallback ^ clientSideProviderFactoryCallback, System::String ^ className, System::String ^ imageName, System::Windows::Automation::ClientSideProviderMatchIndicator flags);

param.name: clientSideProviderFactoryCallback
param.span: 为窗口创建客户端提供程序的方法。

span.span: The method that creates the client-side provider for a window.

param.name: className
param.span: 提供程序所用于的窗口的类名称。

span.span: The class name of the window that the provider is used for.

param.name: imageName
param.span: 窗口所驻留的进程的可执行文件或 DLL 的名称。

span.span: The name of the executable or DLL for the process where the window resides.

param.name: flags
param.span: 指定匹配窗口类名称时的行为的标志。

span.span: Flags that specify behavior when matching window class names.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 指定的进程内遇到类的窗口时 `className` `imageName` ，它将调用 `clientSideProviderFactoryCallback` 来创建客户端提供程序的实例。When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] encounters a window of class `className` within the process specified by `imageName`, it calls `clientSideProviderFactoryCallback` to create an instance of the client-side provider. 如果 `className` 为 `null` ，则将提供程序用于找不到任何其他提供程序的所有窗口。If `className` is `null`, the provider is used for all windows for which no other provider is found. 如果 `imageName` 为 `null` ，则将提供程序用于包含窗口类的所有进程。If `imageName` is `null`, the provider is used for all processes containing the window class.

The window class name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `null` ，则将为没有找到其他提供程序的所有窗口调用该提供程序。If is `null`, the provider is called for all windows for which no other provider is found.
